Parameters.Name: spindle_load_stack_size
Parameters.Description: Maximum number of values in stack (avg applied to this many values)

Parameters.Name: tolerance_for_acceleration_detection
Parameters.Description: Allowable delta between actual feed and target feed to determine if GRBL is accelerating or at constant speed

Parameters.Name: override_commands_per_adjustment
Parameters.Description: Number of override commands to be issued after an adjustment has been calculated

Parameters.Name: override_command_delay
Parameters.Description: Time between adjustment commands getting issued

Parameters.Name: cap_for_feed_increase_during_z_movement
Parameters.Description: Maximum allowed adjustment for FeedUps if its moving at all in Z axis
